languages.text: "Решение о будущем данной единицы примет конклав флота Осознание. Был совершен великий грех, и за него предстоит понести великое покаяние. Если оно окажется невыносимо для жизненных функций данной единицы, она утешит себя мыслью, что приложила усилие к исправлению замысленного ею кощунства".

"The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."
languages.original_text: "Решение о будущем данной единицы примет конклав флота Осознание. Был совершен великий грех, и за него предстоит понести великое покаяние. Если оно окажется невыносимо для жизненных функций данной единицы, она утешит себя мыслью, что приложила усилие к исправлению замысленного ею кощунства".

traits.locale_text: "The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it had intended."

"The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it had intended."

"The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."

"The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."

"The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."

languages.text: “本单位的未来将会有真理开拓者舰队密会进行决定。既然犯下了大罪，就应当接受彻底的悔改。如果本单位认为并不需要彻底终止其重要功能，本单位就会进行自我安慰，认为它已经努力弥补了它犯下的亵渎之罪。”
languages.original_text: "The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."

traits.locale_text: “本单位的未来将会有真理开拓者舰队密会进行决定。既然犯下了大罪，就应当接受彻底的悔改。如果本单位认为并不需要彻底终止其重要功能，本单位就会进行自我安慰，认为它已经努力弥补了它犯下的亵渎之罪。”

languages.text: «El cónclave de la Flota Conciencia decidirá el futuro de esta unidad. Se ha cometido una grave transgresión y se debe expiar con actos equivalentes. Si acaban por ser intolerables para las funciones vitales de dicha unidad, se consolará con saber que se ha esforzado por rectificar al sacrilegio que ha cometido».
languages.original_text: "The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."

traits.locale_text: «El cónclave de la Flota Conciencia decidirá el futuro de esta unidad. Se ha cometido una grave transgresión y se debe expiar con actos equivalentes. Si acaban por ser intolerables para las funciones vitales de dicha unidad, se consolará con saber que se ha esforzado por rectificar al sacrilegio que ha cometido».

languages.text: 「このユニットの将来については、コグニサンス艦隊の評議会が決定を下す。大きな罪が犯され、大きなリペンタンスが生まれてくる。それが当該ユニットの重要な機能として容認しえないと判明した場合、そのユニットは意図した神聖冒涜行為を正すべく努力したと考えることで、自らを慰めることになる」
languages.original_text: "The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."

traits.locale_text: 「このユニットの将来については、コグニサンス艦隊の評議会が決定を下す。大きな罪が犯され、大きなリペンタンスが生まれてくる。それが当該ユニットの重要な機能として容認しえないと判明した場合、そのユニットは意図した神聖冒涜行為を正すべく努力したと考えることで、自らを慰めることになる」

languages.text: "Die Entscheidung über die Zukunft dieser Einheit wird von der Konklave der Erkenntnisflotte getroffen. Es wurde ein großes Vergehen begangen, und es gilt große Buße zu tun. Falls sich das für die Vitalfunktionen der betreffenden Einheit als unerträglich erweisen sollte, wird sie sich mit dem Gedanken trösten, dass sie den Versuch unternommen hat, das geplante Sakrileg zu korrigieren."
languages.original_text: "The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."

traits.locale_text: "Die Entscheidung über die Zukunft dieser Einheit wird von der Konklave der Erkenntnisflotte getroffen. Es wurde ein großes Vergehen begangen, und es gilt große Buße zu tun. Falls sich das für die Vitalfunktionen der betreffenden Einheit als unerträglich erweisen sollte, wird sie sich mit dem Gedanken trösten, dass sie den Versuch unternommen hat, das geplante Sakrileg zu korrigieren."

languages.text: « Le conclave de la Flotte de la Connaissance décidera du sort de cette unité. Une grave transgression a été commise et elle appelle un profond repentir. Si l'épreuve se révèle trop rude pour ses fonctions vitales, l'unité en question se consolera à la pensée d'avoir tout fait pour rectifier le sacrilège commis. »
languages.original_text: "The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."

traits.locale_text: « Le conclave de la Flotte de la Connaissance décidera du sort de cette unité. Une grave transgression a été commise et elle appelle un profond repentir. Si l'épreuve se révèle trop rude pour ses fonctions vitales, l'unité en question se consolera à la pensée d'avoir tout fait pour rectifier le sacrilège commis. »

languages.text: "Bu birimin geleceğine dair karar, Malumat Filosu'nun meclisi tarafından verilecektir. Büyük bir suç işlenmiştir ve bunun için büyük bir cezaya katlanılmalıdır. Bu ceza, söz konusu birimin hayati fonksiyonlarının direnemeyeceği ölçülerde olursa bu birim, niyetlendiği hürmetsizliği telafi etme çabalarında bulunduğu düşüncesiyle kendisini teselli edecektir."
languages.original_text: "The decision on the future of this unit will be made by the conclave of the Cognisance Fleet. A great transgression has been committed, and there is great repentance to be borne. If it proves intolerable to the vital functions of the unit in question, it will console itself with the thought that it has made an effort to rectify the sacrilege it intended."
